snippet: It wasn’t a no-hitter, but it was an impressive outing nonetheless by R. A. Dickey: 100 pitches, no walks and a complete-game shutout against the Cardinals.
abstract: New York Mets beat the St Louis Cardinals, 5-0, behind complete-game shutout by Mets pitcher R A Dickey.
lead_paragraph: It wasn’t a no-hitter, but it was an impressive outing nonetheless by R. A. Dickey: 100 pitches, no walks and a complete-game shutout against the Cardinals.

headline.seo: Dickey Pitches a Shutout as Mets Beat Cardinals
headline.main: Day After No-Hitter, Dickey Puts Up More Zeros
headline.print_headline: Day After No-Hitter, Dickey Puts Up More Zeros
